// <auto-generated/>
#nullable enable

namespace AotSample;

public partial class SampleAotSchema
{
    [global::GraphQL.GraphQLConstructor]
    public SampleAotSchema(global::System.IServiceProvider services, global::System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<global::GraphQL.DI.IConfigureSchema> configurations) : base(services, configurations)
    {
        Configure();
    }

    private void Configure()
    {
        AddAotType<global::GraphQL.Types.AutoRegisteringObjectGraphType<Query>, QueryGraphType>();
        AddAotType<global::GraphQL.Types.StringGraphType>();
        AotTypes.Add(typeof(global::CustomScalarGraphType), () => new global::CustomScalarGraphType(GetRequiredService<global::System.String>()));
        AotTypes.Add(typeof(global::ComplexScalarGraphType), () => new global::ComplexScalarGraphType(GetRequiredService<global::System.String>(), GetRequiredService<global::System.String>(), GetRequiredService<global::System.IServiceProvider>()));
        AotTypes.Add(typeof(global::TypeWithRequiredProps), () => new global::TypeWithRequiredProps(GetRequiredService<global::System.String>())
        {
            Name = GetRequiredService<global::System.String>(),
            Count = GetRequiredService<global::System.Int32>(),
        });
        AddAotType<global::GraphQL.Types.IdGraphType, global::GraphQL.Types.GuidGraphType>();

        RegisterType(typeof(global::GraphQL.Types.AutoRegisteringObjectGraphType<Query>));
        RegisterType(typeof(global::GraphQL.Types.StringGraphType));
        RegisterType(typeof(global::CustomScalarGraphType));
        RegisterType(typeof(global::ComplexScalarGraphType));
        RegisterType(typeof(global::TypeWithRequiredProps));
        RegisterType(typeof(global::GraphQL.Types.IdGraphType));
        RegisterType(typeof(global::UnknownGraphType));

        RegisterTypeMapping(typeof(string), typeof(global::GraphQL.Types.StringGraphType));

        Query = GetRequiredService<global::GraphQL.Types.AutoRegisteringObjectGraphType<Query>>();

    }
}
